greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of k-covers of a labeled n-set, k=1..2^n-1.
reference: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 165.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..10, flattened
formula: Also T(n,k) = (1/k!)*Sum_{j=0..k} Stirling1(k+1, j+1)*(2^j-1)^n. E.g.f.: Sum(exp(y*(2^n-1))*log(1+x)^n/n!, n=0..infinity)/(1+x). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 30 2004
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jun 14 2000
